description: This file defines a 'Pagination' UI component using the LightningJS framework. It contains a template with navigation controls, computed properties for pagination data, and input handlers for navigation actions. The component interacts with a centralized store and actions for state management.

classes.name: Pagination
classes.description: A LightningJS component that provides pagination controls with display logic and event handlers.

methods.name: page
methods.description: Returns the current page number from the store state.

methods.name: pageSize
methods.description: Returns the number of items per page from the store state.

methods.name: total
methods.description: Returns the total number of items from the store state.

methods.name: totalPages
methods.description: Calculates and returns the total number of pages.

methods.name: label
methods.description: Generates the label string indicating current page and total items.
